title: Lego Mindstorms Autonomous Robot
stack: C++ · Python · OpenCV · SLAM · ArUco · PID · A*
description: Autonomous robot that collects & delivers color‑coded blocks. Used ArUco markers + homogeneous transforms for camera→robot/world frames, integrated SLAM for mapping and PID for motion control, and A* on a discretized grid for optimal paths.

title: Disease Detection in Maize Leaves
stack: CNN (sliding window) · OpenCV · TensorRT · ArmNN · Embedded
description: Convolutional sliding‑window detector for maize leaf diseases & nutrient deficiency (≈86% accuracy). Collected dataset in the field; deployed on Odroid XU4 (ArmNN/Linaro) and Jetson Nano (TensorRT).

title: Active Learning for Text Labelling
description: Active‑learning loop with teacher–student self‑supervision for text datasets. Automated annotation & iteration in Label Studio to reduce manual labelling load.

title: QR‑based Attendance System
stack: Django · REST API · Android · PostgreSQL · Heroku
description: Multi‑role web + Android system. Professors generate QR codes; students scan via Android app. Backend in Django with REST APIs; PostgreSQL on Heroku.
